title: Kemurikusa (TV)
synopsis: A few young girls with strange powers and a tree that has grown through a railcar cling onto life in a desolate land, searching for its last reservoirs of water. Their routine struggle to survive is interrupted by the arrival of Wakaba, a boy with no memory beyond his own name.
staff: [['Tatsuki', ['Director', ' Script', ' Original Creator']], ['nano', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['WEST GROUND', ['Theme Song Composition']], ['Shirouzu, Yuuko', ['Art Director']]]
